Customer Service...... what service.

Review.Titre: Fun tool for interacting with your pet.
The camera is helping us watch our…
Review.Contenu: The camera is helping us watch our rescue dog w/separation anxiety and be sure he's behaving.  Be sure you have good internet service.  We live in a rural area and are lucky to have 6 or 7 gigs.  There is delay on the camera.  We are not sure if this is camera or our internet and that is the reason for 4 stars.  Also, the camera placement depends on where router is.  Petcub is helping us and I do not regret buying it.  I got great customer service to my questions before buying.

I wish the motion detection was more sensitive when recording pets movement. When I’m trying to figure out which of my cats is doing something wrong the camera misses it. It records humans just fine but is not sensitive enough for my cats

Review.Titre: The camera functions well and is…
Review.Contenu: The camera functions well and is affordable. The only reason I gave 4 out of 5 stars is that the motion detection feature, which in years past used to be free, now requires a subscription to use.

Had an issue with my Petcube cam connecting to the Internet. It worked at first, then was offline. If not for that it would be 5 stars, as the reply to my query was almost immediate, which is practically unheard of with most things. The advice was perfect and worked. Very pleased with my new toy  and will be trying not to get distracted at work by what my little boys are up to.

I’ve really appreciated having the Petcube so I can keep an eye on my pets and the house while I’m out. I had an issue with my account at one point and the people at Petcube were able to get me sorted within a couple of hours, which was great.

Review.Titre: I love how fast I received the petcube
Review.Contenu: I love how fast I received the petcube! Its a great camera and its super fun to throw the treats when I'm away. But I didn't receive a receipt for the subscription, or any indication/confirmation that it went through.

Awesome customer service! My camera has problems hooking up to my wifi, they helped as much as they could, nothing worked but they were so friendly and understanding, they sent me a replacement camera.
I was very pleased at how quickly my inquiry was responded to.  I replied to the email and received a response within a few minutes. I was successful in resolving the issue I was having. Thank you!

Gives so much peace of mind being able to see the dog when away and knowing that the treats and our voices keep the dog calm.  Very easy to set up and a high quality camera make the cube well worth the money

Great product...at first I was having issues with it but it seems as though they were mistakes that I was making and thanks to the amazing team at Petcube (who were super fast in getting back to me). The issue was solved in a matter of days!

Review.Titre: I was impressed with the promptness in…
Review.Contenu: I was impressed with the promptness in getting back to me about my query and the follow up from there. I am very pleased with the Petcube and have some friends who are now impressed also and are buying one to help with their dog issues.Great product.

I ordered the product from Amazon. Ordering and delivery were fine. I got this product because it was described as wireless. I was expecting it to come with battery or USB charging but the wireless was in reference to it connecting via wi-fi. This was disappointing bc i have a very mouthy puppy and was looking for something that did not have to be plugged in. The initial set up was very easy and straight forward. I had some issues with keeping the camera connected, but it was a simple fix. If you have a converter router that has 2.4 and 5g and the network names are the same, you just have to change one of them. The FAQ answer made it seem more complicated than that but once i figured that out I had no issues. The picture quality is good for a $40 camera. It is serving its purpose as a quick solution for my needs. Customer service was very responsive and willing to help. They checked in several times to make sure my issue was resolved. I recommend it for a simple monitoring device. I would just be mindful if you are using to monitor a puppy or dog that is a chewer or interested in wires. I am still trying to find the best placement for my camera, going to try to mount it.

Review.Titre: It took several goes to get my Petcube…
Review.Contenu: It took several goes to get my Petcube working again. I appreciated The continuity of the service that finally got it resolved

The follow up I received from the staff.  It was tricky for a novice but with all the help I received, it now works fine and the picture is great.  I can rest easy that my pet is fine within the wide radius of the lens.

Review.Titre: It works, customer service is swift
Review.Contenu: Camera had a bug the first time I used it, had to contact customer service and they fixed it fast. Thankful for that. Has been working good ever since.

Review.Titre: The support team is very friendly and…
Review.Contenu: The support team is very friendly and Simply amazing service, and I recommended the products.

Review.Titre: Representative was able to help me with…
Review.Contenu: Representative was able to help me with my problem, and continued to check on me to make sure the problem was resolved
I love this cam. I dont give 5 stars because it doesnt have howling alerts yet.

Review.Titre: Quick response from team and issue…
Review.Contenu: Quick response from team and issue resolved

Review.Titre: Your cameras went offline and you did…
Review.Contenu: Your cameras went offline and you did not notify your customer. I spent time troubleshooting what I believed was an issue on my end. This is an area where you should improve and be proactive.Customer service response and promise to make improvements in the areas of concern was admirable. The team appeared to take a genuine interest in customer satisfaction.  Thank you!

I'm really loving my Petcube camera so far! I was looking for something to check up on my new rescue that wasn't as expensive as those interactive treat cameras, and this one was a great pick! The app is really nice, the camera (and night camera) quality is great, and the audio was just as I expected it to be. The microphone/speaker isn't perfect recording quality, but it really doesn't need to be - and I think it's super reasonable for this price. I love the photo and recording function too!

Love the petcube, love how sleek it is. The only thing is that as this is an animal product, I would recommend making the cord more animal/teeth proof. It lasted maybe 48 hours until my kitten chewed it up, and I had to buy a new one with a cord protector on it. Otherwise, it’s great!

Review.Titre: Great product; little bit too big
Review.Contenu: The camera is high quality and I love seeing what my dog is up to while I’m at work. It’s also fun flinging her a couple treats every now and then. I’ve had no issues using the app—overall I’m very pleased other than the overall size of the unit. It’s a bit bulkier than I had anticipated and I’m afraid my dog will knock it down one day when she’s upset for not receiving a treat.

Initial customer service was bumpy, but the second representative to jump in was very helpful, polite, etc.  (My initial device wouldn't connect and had to be sent back.) The device itself may not have been worth the investment for me, as it is difficult to hold my cat's attention.  However, it functions very well and I can easily picture it entertaining my parent's 1 year old puppies endlessly.

Packaging was neat and eco friendly. Instructions were extremely easy to follow. Device pairing did not work the first time I tried because I was too far away from the WiFi modem. The camera, treat launcher, and sound all work great! After I mounted it on the wall, however, it will launch two or three treats at a time. I’m sure this can be fixed with larger treats.

I bought the Petcube Bites Pet Camera from Petcube through Amazon. It allows me to monitor my puppy throughout the day while I'm at work. My favorite aspect is that it sends me notifications when it senses movement. When she gets bored and starts moving around the room, I can toss her treats - a nice surprise for her when she is home alone during the day. It also feels like a little security system.

Review.Titre: Good once set up alternative utilized
Review.Contenu: The set up process did not connect immediately for me but I was able to find an alternative process on PetCube’s website. The app appears easy to navigate and the unit itself is well built and sturdy. Depending on the height the unit is placed and the treats used, I think the treat fling could get some good distance! I chose the all black unit and it’s very sleek looking.

I love being able to watch my dog while I'm away all day at work. Being able to talk through the camera is AWESOME! However, there have been a few times where I try to log in to see what he's doing and the camera will be "busy" or tell me I am "next in line" and have to wait a minute or so for the camera to turn on. That is my only disappointment with it so far.

I have a 5 month old puppy at home and work full time. The Petcube allows me to check in on my dog throughout the day and make sure she is doing okay. The treats are a great idea to reinforce good behavior. However, the cube tends to malfunction at times and spit out more than one or no treats. Despite this I would highly recommend this for anyone who is away from their dog for long periods of time and misses their puppy like I do!

It’s great! I’m moving into an apartment from living with my lifelong roommates (aka parents) so I got this before we move in to train her on it. It’s so much fun! And I love checking in on her and giving her treats. The camera quality is not always the best, due to connection and cell service, but it works for what you need it for even when it’s not the best.

Review.Titre: really cool, could improve camera angle
Review.Contenu: It is a really cool invention to play with your pets when you're not home. But I think there are 2 important features that should be improved: camera angle should reach at least 250º.  And the laser/voice commands should respond instantaneously. It logs and it's kind of annoying. Everything else is perfect. The packaging is adorable, and the cube design is flawless.

The app does everything it is supposed to. I wish it was an option to just watch other people play on the camera after you get kicked off instead of the call ending. It happens a lot with particular pets when I'm playing then my turn is over but I still want to watch the pets play with the next person in line, but the call is ended. I'm making a lot of friends in this app, and it's so nice to see so many happy animals.

I love my petcube device, however I had to buy a new one as the first I purchased it broke down and the return and replacement method has not been succesful. I had to buy a second one and still have to ship the deffective one.The petcube company SHOULD replace those deffective petcubes with no need of the client sending the old one.

The Petcube Bites came in a nice package and treats for my dog were included. Instructions for set-up were easy to follow. The only reason why I did not give it 5 stars is because I could not choose the amount of treats dispensed when I pressed the treats button on my phone. Sometimes it would send 2 treats and other times it was 5 treats with one press of the button. Otherwise I was very impressed with this product and the image quality of the video and microphone.

Review.Titre: When mom's away, watch the doggie play
Review.Contenu: After a few issues getting set-up, which the customer service team helped with very quickly, the Petcube has been a welcome and entertaining addition to our home. I situated it too low initially, so my dog just barked at it all day after she realized it housed treats. I moved it and this made a big difference. Saving and sharing videos is not important to me, but I like being able to peek in on her during the day and send her a treat or two. It's pretty funny.

We all love to have our pets close, but unfortunately it's not always possible. Petcube Play and its app is an awesome tool to help you check on your beloved pet during the day. It's easy to set up, the app is user friendly and it gives you some options to share your pet's interaction with the camera. You can either check live or check the interaction history, which is very nice. The laser might be better suited for cats, but it is still a lovely product.

Based on my previous review, Mariana from Head of Customer Support reached out to me and assisted with my shipment and kept me updated with tracking information. She also followed up several times by email and gave me a 3 months subscription to Petcube cloud's service. Aside from customer service, the Petcube is great for keeping an eye on my kitties while I'm at work. I can play with them anytime I want if they're awake. Definitely a great purchase!

I like how easy it was to set up and use with the android app. The laser works pretty well for me when calibrated. I wish the speaker and microphone were of higher quality. The echo from the microphone gets annoying. I look forward to seeing improvements and innovations in future iterations of the Petcube Play and other Petcube products.

Pretty cool!  Camera quality is better than I anticipated. So far the sound isn’t the greatest when I’m trying to talk to my pets be a use there are noises that confuse them, but they are working to fix that for me when customer service spoke to me.  When I’m just watching my dogs go about their normal sleep schedule!

Good company that does its best to support the customer. Unfortunately I've had a lot of problems with my devices breaking, but customer service will help you replace it if it's within one year of purchase. I just wish the product itself could last longer because it is something I really enjoy using.

I love having the Petcube and being able to watch my animals.  I also like that you can play with a lazer with them and talk to them.  I had some technically difficulties when I was trying to setup my Petcube, but support was awesome at helping me! I highly recommend this to watch your furry friends!

After the initial disappointment of my Petcube arriving a day later than Amazon promised it, I really like it!  It gives me peace of mind being able to check in on my fur babies throughout the day.  I'm still figuring out how to use it effectively and have learned that my boys are incredibly boring when I'm away. The wide angle camera allows me to see a large area and I can even zoom in.  I think the laser would be enjoyed more by cat owners.  Too bad the camera doesn't have a treat dispenser...that would be awesome

Review.Titre: Perfect to keep an eye on little troublemakers!
Review.Contenu: I love having the ability to keep an eye on my pup when I'm not home. I've had a little trouble with getting the laser to work consistently, and have to reset it every once in a while to get it working again. That said, everything else works like a dream and the night vision is AWESOME!

Review.Titre: Great two-way camera, tossing a treat needs tweaking
Review.Contenu: Great two-way camera, treat delivery system needs tweaking.  I wanted to use the camera as a way of counter-conditioning my dogs barking reaction to the doorbell, but unfortunately the delay is too slow.  The implications for training other behaviors would also be great if this could be tweaked.

This is a fun addition to my living room. My fat cat comes running when she hears the unit start working. I like that it has night vision so I can see what’s happening no matter the time. It alerts to sounds and motion if you want. Lots of extras in the app that I’m getting used to as well.

Review.Titre: Overall this is a good product
Review.Contenu: Overall this is a good product! The wide lens is great to enable you to see the entire room. In a completely dark house, the night vision still enables you to see very well. The camera quality is pretty good and the zoom function works to allow you to really see your pet. The laser can be very slow to respond and doesn't always go where you tell it to. The motion activation recording can be activated by changes in light inside the house, not just your pet, but overall that just means you have more recordings. I would buy this product again!

Review.Titre: This device has allowed us to monitor …
Review.Contenu: This device has allowed us to monitor our new puppy quite well! He has been escaping from his crate. The camera caputed how and when he escaped, so we were able to figure the problem out. As we transition him to being home with no crate, again, we feel more confident, keeping an eye on him. The only downfall is that once you unplug the camera you loose the free 4 hours of video stored. Sometimes we wanted to review the video after we discovered something missing and couldn't if it was already unplugged. Other than that, it as been great!

The Petcube is great! I love being able to check up on my dogs while I’m away. The treat shooter is great to give the dogs treats while I’m gone and they love it! It doesn’t always shoot out the same amount of treats each time, but it can shoot them at a very decent distance!

I love having the ability to check in on my dog throughout the day to see what she's up to.  Being able to see her little ears perk up when I call her name brightens my day.   I had some issues setting up my wifi with the Petcube Bites, but it was worth the effort!

Review.Titre: Just can't figure out how to get the…
Review.Contenu: Just can't figure out how to get the sound to work?

I just started a new job, and wanted a way to check on my pup and ease him back into long days at home alone. The Petcube is great! The video quality is amazing, and the lens gives a wide clear view of the room. The setup was super easy, it connected to my wifi with no problems. It did have to update the software, but it was quick and easy. I love that it sends notifications to your iphone when your pet is in the room. My pup quickly picked up where the treats were coming from, and enjoys that he gets bonus treats when I'm not home! Also I have super cute photos of his face!

I really really like the Petcube. It’s so sleek and pretty. It allows me to see my dog and what she’s doing during the day when I’m at work. Sometimes the video has a little delay probably because of the internet connection but it doesn’t bother me too much.

Review.Titre: The camera is really great and so is…
Review.Contenu: The camera is really great and so is the motion sensor. Another great feature about the camera is the night vision. I love the fact that I can check on my animals and my house when I am away from home. The packaging is beautiful and the set up is fast and easy. The PetCube even comes with a bag of treats to get you started. I took off one star because I have been having problems with audio feature that allows you to talk to your pets. For me that is the least important feature. I would recommend this product to my friends and family. You can't beat the price and its fun to fling treats at your pets.
Problem solvedI was experiencing connection issues, tried several troubleshooting ideas could not connect and they are sending me a new one. I hope it work, I love my pet cube.

Review.Titre: A Great Way to Check in on Your Animals From Anywhere! (Usually)
Review.Contenu: I have had a new Petcube Play for about a month now and I love it! I use it in our spare bedroom to watch our foster animals and see how they transition to their new environment . It is an awesome way to watch them during the day while we are gone as well as capture footage and photos of them running and playing to post on their adoption profiles.The one negative I have experienced with our Petcube is that many times it disconnects or appears offline so I cannot access the camera. It is on the same level as the router, so it was my hope we wouldn't have connectivity issues, but it does happen occasionally. If that was fixed, it would be perfect!

Review.Titre: Worth it but maybe not for as inexpensive it is
Review.Contenu: Quality of the cameras is really good. The laser works really good. The treat dispenser works well. The only problem I have is the microphone option. On either end, it sounds horrible. And there’s no option to adjust the volume.

There is a ton of feedback on the microphone when I try and talk with my pet. I love the camera, it is clear as day and the night vision is so cool! The only thing that would make it better is a smoke detector. Love my Petcube!!

Review.Titre: Great camera/speaker, laser to be desired
Review.Contenu: I love being able to talk to my pets at home. The only negative I have is that no matter how many times I recalibrate the laser, it doesn’t track well on the app, removing a decent part of the functionality of the Petcube

Review.Titre: Great video feed, wish I got the Petcube Bites.
Review.Contenu: Great video feed, clear, the interactive audio is a feature I’m really enjoying, though my dog gets scared and runs away any time I talk to him on it, so I wish I got the Petcube bites version that drops little treats.  It has a laser toy which would be awesome if you have cats, I only have dogs...  It’s really sensitive to motion, the moving shadows from the trees outside the window in the room set it off, so does the ceiling fan if it’s in the frame.  The set up was time consuming bc the reset button wasn’t easy to actually depress, and it wasn’t connecting to my WiFi quickly enough during my initial set up. But, once it finally did, it’s been smooth operation ever since.

I really enjoy the Petcube! It is the most fun when my dogs aren’t paying attention but they love it and I love the videos I get of them with their noses in the treat hole. I can’t wait for our doggy friends to come over

Review.Titre: PetCube left me smiling all day!
Review.Contenu: I have had the best time with this product! There is something wonderful about being able to see my pets throughout the day when I'm not at home. I smiled the whole first day. We all seem amused by the flying treats! My only complaints (if they can even be called that) is that there is an echo when I try to talk to the fur babies; This could be user error. I also wish that I was able to scan the room and not just focus on one area or corner. Last, the treat hole seems to get very dirty from all of the crumbs, which has started to spill onto the floor directly below the unit. They're licked up eventually, so not a huge deal. Overall, I'm really enjoying having this part of our lives.

Review.Titre: It would be great to have the option to…
Review.Contenu: It would be great to have the option to select multiple video files to delete at once rather than having to do it individually.  Otherwise so far so good!

Review.Titre: Very nice product and easy to use!
Review.Contenu: Easy to set up. Packaged very well. I have had the Petcube only a few days and already have had a lot of fun with it.  We got our four-legged family member for my granddaughter, who spends time at our house two weekends a month. Now, my granddaughter has also downloaded the app and is able to see and talk to her "pup" when she is not at the house. She loves that she can interact with her dog now on a daily basis. I think it is going to take a little more time for our dog to get used to the treat dispenser. It is a little on the loud side and he is afraid of it. Our dog is also unsure when he hears our voices but does not see us. Overall, I am very happy with the Petcube. Love the additional interaction it has provided us.

Review.Titre: Great for seeing what pets do when you're not around!
Review.Contenu: The PetCube Bites is a great gadget and was very easy to set-up and get working. The app was easy to install and use although I would recommend reading the entire online manual as some options were not obvious at first. The camera and overall construction seem to be of excellent quality and yes it does let you remotely toss snack to your pet which is really clever!What I really like is the ability to see what our cats do when no one is watching them- we put the PetCube in the kitchen by their food the first night and were amazed how many times the cats came downstairs to eat- cool! I will say that I think this device is probably even better for dog owners based on the interactive features and the treat size (too many small treats dispensed at once).
Although it took me two phone calls, with different customer service reps, and different directions to follow, my petcube was fixed.  Thank you. I would definitely recommend Pet Cube.

Review.Titre: Good gadget to monitor your pet/home with bonus treat dispenser
Review.Contenu: Got the Petcube Bites in silver.. looks slick and packaged nicely.  It was easy to install.. just the usual troubleshooting (rebooting to get the wifi to work).  The camera is great as it gives you a clear view of the entire room.  You have to get used to the app to turn on the mic if you want to be heard by your pet.. it's not automatic.  My dog liked the treat dispenser and a nice feature is you can choose how many and how often a treat is dispensed.  I also like the sharing feature so our family can all install the Petcube app on our smartphone and see our dog in real time, communicate with him and give him treats!  My sons are in college so it's nice that they can see him anytime.  I just installed the Petcube so I still have to study the other features but overall, it serves its purpose.
Support is excellent. Sales is excellent. Product is great!! Some software issues with catching daily activities but still a worthwhile product. I think I now have 6 cubes!

I am giving this camera 4/5 stars.I got this camera to keep an eye on my cocker spaniel while I wasn't at home. I received the package very quickly and got it set up very easily as well. The image quality is surprisingly good. I am planning to purchase another one for the bedroom (this one is in the living room). I am reading on other reviews the set up to connect multiple cameras is fairly simple and easy, as well.The laser feature is very fun and I have not had any major issues with it yet. It is a little laggy, but it's not a big deal for me. My little guy has a lot of fun with it! The two way audio is also very fun. Rooney was a little bit freaked out by it at first, but he's picked up on it being my voice and will listen through the device when I tell him off the couch!!Would definitely recommend this product to anyone.
I had to contact the customer service team via the ‘chat’ option & they were very quick to solve my missing delivery.Ordering was easy & i’m now very happy.
I really like to be able to watch my cat when I am at work.Downside:Night vision camera not always kicks inTreat not always come outOverall great tool

Review.Titre: This is an awesome product! My kitten loves it
Review.Contenu: This is an awesome product! I love being able to check in on my kitten while I'm gone at work during the day, especially given the fact that when my roommate is gone he is by himself. As soon as he hears the noise the camera makes when it drops treats to be launched, he comes running. One issue I've had is that because his kitten treats are so small, the Petcube typically shoots out 7 or 8 treats at once, while I would prefer less at a time so I would feel better about giving them to him several times throughout the day. I doubt this would happen with dog treats since they tend to be a little bigger. I also have had some minor connectivity issues, but this may be primarily related to my WiFi connection rather than the Petcube itself. Overall, I really like it and have enjoyed playing with my cat while I'm away from home. I would definitely recommend it to friends with pets, especially dog owners.
easy  set up. the only issue I've had is that it only shoots the treats out about foot from the Petcube.

Review.Titre: Giving this product a solid 4 stars
Review.Contenu: Giving this product a solid 4 stars! Setup was easy, camera is great, but the app is super clunky. Fix that and I would give this a 5.

you.The quality of video is very good and the night vision works well; although we do leave a light on when we leave him at night. What I do suggest is that you do have to have a good Internet connection for this to work well. The Petcube Play, laser cam has a red laser light integrated in it that my dog loves to play with when we are at home. Personally, I would never turn it on when I’m away. Also, the voice feature works well, you can hear the dog and they can hear you like you are in the room with them, but we won’t ever use it (unless it is necessary) because we think it might make him edgy to hear us and not see us.The only thing I don’t like, is that there is no Off and On button, at least I have not found it. Also, that it doesn’t come with a stand to place on the floor or to the edge of a table was a negative for us. Other than that, it is very user friendly and we have already recommended it to other pet parents (you can also use it as a normal “spy” camera, not only for pets *wink wink* lol).

I've really loved the petcube bites so far but have experienced a few regular hiccups.  The image is usually pretty clear (love the "at night" mode!) and I'm able to talk through the device which has been helpful for managing my pet's behavior.  I love being able to "share" the camera with friends and family who want to see my dog and the noise and sound alerts have been great. The treat dispenser has been reliable up until this last week- it hasn't been dispensing and I haven't quite been able to figure out the problem.  My biggest concern with the camera is that it frequently tells me "busy" and that I need to wait 90 seconds when no one is using the camera except me.  I've tried a few different things (waiting for it to load, quitting the program, etc.) but this problem still seems to randomly persist at least 3 times per day.  I would still recommend Petcube Bites to anyone looking to monitor their pet but you may experience some technical difficulties along the way.

Review.Titre: this thing is great thanks it should…
Review.Contenu: this thing is great thanks it should come with a mount automatically. I bought the mount and it now it is perfect!

Review.Titre: Petcube is fun to use and watch the …
Review.Contenu: Petcube is fun to use and watch the pets. It is a bit cliche may be the internet connection. But I still love it.

Review.Titre: Love that I can check in on my kitties …
Review.Contenu: Love that I can check in on my kitties when I'm away.  I wish the laser function was smoother - very jumpy.
Love the product. Nice option to check on your pet. Customer service is rather slow though.(

I ordered my Petcube a few weeks ago, and so far, am truly pleased with my purchase. The cube itself is small, compact and easy to place on a lower level shelf or the floor. I put mine on the bottom tier of a bookshelf and have a great view of the entire living room. The Petcube has a long power cord which is super helpful for those who have older apartments where outlets can be a bit scarce. In addition, the device was relatively easy to set up and log into, so I was up and running in no time.Since hooking up the Petcube, I have taken time throughout my day to check in on my cats. It is fairly entertaining to see what they are up to, but in addition, it is nice to know that they are safe and nothing bad has gone down while I am at work.My only point of concern with the purchase is that there is no ability to turn the Petcube on or off. Ideally, the app would have a "at home" feature which would turn off the video feed but that is not the case. So, if you are worried about personal privacy, the only way to turn off the cube is to physically unplug the device. Other than that hassle, the Petcube has been a great addition to my kitty care routine!
Petcube has been an excellent purchase! A lot of fun you can have when spending time with your pet.

Review.Titre: Great fun for crazy cat parents!
Review.Contenu: We have a very naughty, clever Bengal who loves nothing more than treats and I've always wanted to know what he gets up to when we aren't here (other than terrorising his brother, that's obvious because of the clumps of fur around the house)This device comes in a really cool box, super easy instructions and set up. I would 100% recommend this product only if you can attach it to a wall (screws and a easy measuring guide provided) because after the first treats came flying out our cat tried to eat the pet cube, attack the pet cube and then sat there and tried to get his paw up in the hole to knock out treats so needless to say it was on its back in 30 seconds post treat giving.The camera on it is great fun, good quality, a really wide angle and starts recording when it senses the cats. The app and pet cube paired easily, the flashing lights indicate different things so is easy to know when it's recording. You can only pair one device but share with family and they can then view the camera too and feed treats if they fancy. I personally liked this but might be worth briefing them not to over feed! Some reviews have mentioned you can’t turn it off but if you don’t want anyone to view it just in plug it or don’t allow them access to the camera!My cat is so intrigued by it. He goes nuts when he hears our voice through the speaker, its loud enough that he can hear it from other rooms. He will sit and stare at it for hours hoping more treats will fly out (the distance you can get on the treats is hilarious!) The price seems a little expensive but for piece of mind that your pets are ok and the fact it can basically double as a security camera as it has night mode, makes it worth the money!

Review.Titre: It’s nice to check in on kids and…
Review.Contenu: It’s nice to check in on kids and doubles as security
Super fast shipping, easy set up, easy app!
Inconsistent but I'm happy I got it.
I purchased the cube to watch & talk to my pets while I'm away from the home.I have noticed the cats have been wanting to spend more time in the room where I have the cube.

This is a great little camera for watching my cats. With two way audio I can talk to and hear my pets when out and keep an eye on what they are doing! Compared to many other products, this camera was very affordable, and the monthly service premium is under a fiver per month. It is optional, but I have found the customer service very good indeed on the rare occasion I’ve had technical issues. Very prompt replies and they will keep working the problem until solved. I would highly recommend PetCube and its service. 5*
Very prompt response & problem fixed immediately - we love Petcube

My wife's phone was having problems connecting to the Petcube. Technical support went back and forth a few times to help us identify the issue and solve the problem. Very happy with the support and friendliness of the team

An amazing product and outstanding customer service! The camera design is very stylish. The quality of the video is very good. At first, I was upset thinking that only one device could be connected to the camera, and I wrote a review about it. To my surprise, Petcube support responded within an hour with a step-by-step instruction on how to address my issue. Now that the issue has been fixed, I am very happy with this great product.

I love Petcube, I've used one of their products for years. The device itself works great, I always rely on it when I'm traveling to check in on my pet. And their customer service representatives are knowledgeable, quick, and helpful.

Petcube is amazing! It gives me ease of mind being able to check on my animals when I can't be home with them. Due to my health I have been in the hospital a lot recently, so being able to turn on the camera and see and talk to them has really helped.

Review.Titre: GREAT CAMERA AND TREATS IS SO FUN!
Review.Contenu: We love our PetCube and have so much fun with our Berniedoodle popping out the treats. He loves it, the camera is clear and seeing our pup while we are away from the house is a huge plus!!! Talking to him is just the best! We would highly recommend it for all pet owners out there! You won't be disappointed.
Any questions and queries are answers super efficiently and with great help! I was having issues with my app to see my fur babies and they very speedily helped me and sorted the issue very quickly!

Review.Titre: Very easy to set up and very clear…
Review.Contenu: Very easy to set up and very clear video. I can keep an eye on my mischievous puppy and catch her before the bad act occures, like counter scavaging, or chasing the cats. Big puppies can cause mayhem. Best to nip it in the bud. These cameras help enormously. I just wish I could connect them to my home security camera system.

Review.Titre: An excellent product. Gives me peace of mind when I leave my dog home.
Review.Contenu: I have been using the Petcube Play for several years with good resolution and clarity and ease of operation. The viewing angle is wide so I can see a lot of the room. A couple of weeks ago, however,  I had difficulty connecting despite several tries. I contacted your customer service and they patiently walked me through several scenarios until we were able to solve the problem. They were easy to reach and spent all the time I needed without trying to rush me. I was very impressed. To me, customer service is a very important part of any product.

Review.Titre: The petcube is a great product
Review.Contenu: The petcube is a great product, easy to set up, easy to connect to new wifi. The image is clear and no more to pay if you don't want extras. Customer service was quick to respond and follow up although itcwas an issue with my WiFi not the cube! Have recommended to friend's and family especially as on offer now £39 this easter.

Fantastic customer service!Very helpful with the support the company (Petcube) gave me. My issue was resolved pretty quickly and my Petcube is running beautifully and my babies can now hear me. Thank you so much to all the people that dealt with me. Yes most definitely will be looking into getting another one for my house that will feed my babies too

I had problems with a "trusted certificate" system error when trying to log on to the app in order to set up the device. I contacted Customer Support through the website with no response, so I emailed them directly.  We had several back and forth emails in an attempt to determine the problem and then how to correct the issue. We finally got it to work! I'm so excited to set up the camera/ treat dispenser! I can't say how pleased and grateful I am for the help of the Support team.  It took a few of them to find the right solution.  Their persistence and professionalism were top notch.

Review.Titre: Perfect camera for easy pet monitoring
Review.Contenu: Camera was really easy to set up and the video quality has been good - not lagging. Customer service is exceptional and super quick to help with any technical issues!Only minus would be that the camera is not chordless and only way to turn the camera off is by unplugging it. Also, wish that you wouldn’t have to subscribe to monthly payments if you want the camera to download videos or save recordings when it detects movement or noise. Regardless of this, the camera for me was a big update from my previous pet monitor.

The customer service/support for this company is amazing. I was having a number of connectivity issues with my Pet Cam, and needed to connect with them each day for roughly three days. Each time I connected with someone in very quickly, they were patient, kind and very knowledgeable, and got my issue resolved. I even lost connection with them during one of the interactions and they emailed me to follow up with next steps/instructions. Really great experience!

I got my petcube and was super excited. It works great! Can keep an eye on my pup and toss him treats! Had a problem with android phone not working with microphone over mobile data but they are on top of fixing it already and added to investigation list company went above and beyond and helped refund my money so I can purchase the better unit in the meantime. Excellent customer service! Thankyou again guys!

I contacted Petcube on a Saturday morning (Australia) and I had a response within the hour. After a few more back and forth emails they fixed my issue immediately. Would not hesitate to contact them again. They were friendly, courteous and very helpful in explaining. Thank you so much. I can now enjoy watching and hearing my 2 dachshunds whilst Im out.🌟

Review.Titre: Best Pet Camera Purchase I Made
Review.Contenu: I love using my PetCube to check on my little guy when I'm not around. The image quality is great, even during the night. I also appreciate that I can save videos when he does something adorable. I recently upgraded my plan and got the Petcube Bites. I can't wait to set it up and use it. I will be recommending petcube to anyone looking for a reliable and good quality pet camera!

Review.Titre: Lucky and I are able to communicat…
Review.Contenu: Lucky and I are able to communicate every minute of the day. This system allows me to watch him eat, play, and rest, I don’t have to worry about him, I’m able to concentrate on my work. I have ordered twice and both times the shipping has been fast and efficient. The app and cameras work great and are easy to set up. I’m very happy with my purchases and have recommended this extra “peace of mind” to them.

We absolutely love our Pet cube so much!  During the pandemic our fur babies got used to having us all the time and so did we. We missed and worried for them when we got back out but pet cube has provided such a relief when we can not only see them but even interact with them. This little device has become a source of joy for them as well as for us. Plus! The company itself is awesome! They have integrity and their customer service is real, not just an automated prescripted representative. I've Highly recommended them to all our friends with pets and also to you.

Review.Titre: I have used Petcube since kickstarting…
Review.Contenu: I have used Petcube since kickstarting it and have loved the products themselves. The customer service team just makes the whole experience the best. Any time I have any issues or misunderstanding on how best to use the product, they are quick to respond with solutions.

Review.Titre: The PetCube team is super attentive and…
Review.Contenu: The PetCube team is super attentive and responsive. I did a chat with representative through the app, it had disconnected a couple times. Even though the chat disconnected the staff member still contacted me via email and checked back with me which is how I was able to get the best help and customer experience from them. They helped me everyday, every step of the way all via email. Giving perfect prompt instructions on how to fix my problem.

I have 2 different petcubes - i enjoy both of them.One video stopped working and I've contacted the petcube team and they responded unbelievably quickly (especially now, during the festive season!). Offered a range of solutions, but luckily the problem resolved by itself.Considering getting a 3rd one :)It's actually quite a good security camera too given it has motion & sound detection.

Had an issue with a new faulty Petcube. Camera contacted customer service who were outstanding, they were prompt at replying and looking to see if they could pinpoint the issue and although they were not able to solve the problem which was a faulty camera. (The problem was solved by the supplier replacing the camera.) They were then quick and prompt to move my subscription to a new camera even though it was on Easter Sunday.

Review.Titre: Had  a problem with network not connecting to pet cube play
Review.Contenu: Had  a problem with network not connecting after a house move. Support team (shout-out to Maria) gave me a consize and to-the-point checklist to test and had my problem fully resolved within 2 hours of my inquiry request.

Review.Titre: Top notch score for customer service
Review.Contenu: Top notch score for customer service. Very quick to reply and they initiated follow up when they were missing a response from me.

So far the product seems good, we had a few issued with the connection when out of the house but the support team have been almost immediately available to help and have resolved the issues really well. Im honestly gobsmacked to get such good support on a £50 gadget!

I love my pet cube! It arrived quickly, had minimal packaging that was primarily recyclable, was extremely easy to set-up and it works exactly as advertised, every time. Consistent and reliable. I love it.

Petcube replaced my faulty camera. I appreciate they made the situation right. There were several back and forth emails first in which I was asked the same questions multiple times. However, the response to my intial email to support was super fast.

Our camera went offline and despite trying a number of different things, I contacted Jay via the on line service. He managed me via a number of questions and then advised on a more detailed approach to my problem. As a result, the issue was rectified and our pet camera is now back on line. Great service guys!!

Review.Titre: There was an issue with the audio…
Review.Contenu: There was an issue with the audio feature when the camera was accessed remotely. However, the Petcube team addressed and rectified the matter very promptly and efficiently. The Petcube now works perfectly.

I've had the Petcube Play for 5 years now and it still works well and I'm very happy with it. I've been in touch with the customer service a few times over the years and they always reply fast and continue to give new suggestions to try until the problem is solved so I'm very satisfied

Review.Titre: I had issues with keeping the settings in the app for Petcube camera
Review.Contenu: If you have issues with your device you can easily contact the Customer Care departement. They will contact you rapidly and are very helpful. A firmware update was placed on my Petcube camera and now the app reminds the settings as how I want them to use

Easy to use! I can look in on my babies anytime of day and watch video of the previous nights antics! It also doubles as passive surveillance because it is motion activated and stores activity for three days. Oh and it is a two way radio too! I can communicate with the household and I can hear what they say back (or meow back)!

Review.Titre: This is the best thing I have bought!!!
Review.Contenu: This is the best thing I have bought in a long long time, absolutely love being able to see my fur babies when I am at work, I bought the petcube bites, love that I can talk to my cats through the camera and give them treats. I have got my family to download the app so they can also see my animals, I would definitely recommend this camera.

Petcube has stepped up their responsiveness to another level. I thought I had broken my Petcube when I cleaned it and got moisture into the camera. But they were able to help me reset the device and it's working like new. They were very responsive and helpful throughout!
Petcube’s customer service was very responsive. They were able to resolve the issues I experienced (free 4 hour video recordings disappearance) within a span of 8 hours (due to time differences).

I contacted Petcube about adding another camera to my plan. I did a live chat and interacted with Adrian. He was very professional, knowledgeable and kind. He answered all my questions and made sure my system was working properly.
Great company and quality product. Needed a replacement for the petcam when the first one didn't work and customer service promptly sent me a new one which ended up working great.

Simplicity at its best. Easy to setup and configure. Pet camera and security camera in one. Excellent value for money. Tech support is very prompt and helpful.I highly recommend this camera to anyone.

My dogs are afraid of the alert sound on the PetCube when we connect! They would hide or growl. When I finally asked, Mark S understood exactly what I meant and walked me through turning it off. Excellent customer service! I've had my PetCube for probably 5 years and thrilled with using chat support for the first time!

I want to thank Maria from customer service for her tremendous help. And I’m changing my original rating of 1 star ⭐️ to 5 ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️!  We had a litttrouble connecting but once we did, she took care of my problems very quickly. In fact PetCube replaced two of my three cameras. They are up and running!  Thank you Maria and PetCube!!

Review.Titre: I wanted to shout out to Adrian B for…
Review.Contenu: I wanted to shout out to Adrian B for an incredible customer service experience. I had a very complicated situation trying to confirm that I canceled my account and was requesting a refund for months of not using my Petcube.   Adrian spent about 45 minutes looking up every possible way to confirm my account was canceled and that I would be refunded for my subscription that was not used. I am pretty sure that most would have given up after the first 15-20 minutes of a frustrating situation. I am extremely grateful for Adrian’s kindness and patience!Also my petcube helped me find my lost cat and I am very happy for that and feel it is a very useful device.

Review.Titre: Pet Cube"s PetCam has meet all our…
Review.Contenu: Pet Cube"s PetCam has meet all our needs. We feel so much more relieved when leaving the house that our pet is safe and we can check in regularly. The features are easy to use and provide excellent video/audio results.

We have the Petcube Cam.  Works well for remote viewing of a room and pet.  Reported an improvement to the device settings that was quickly implemented in a firmware update.  Good product and service.

Review.Titre: I love my Pet Cube Camera
Review.Contenu: I love my Pet Cube Camera. I actually use it to monitor my Dad, who has some Dementia.  I can’t be with him all the time, so I keep mine in his kitchen, so I can make sure he is eating and taking his daily pills. It has been a great help. Picture is clear, and so is the sound. Customer Service was quick to respond and very helpful when I couldn’t figure out how to download the videos. My friend uses this to watch her animals when she has to work long days, and when I saw how well hers worked, I thought I would try it for this. I definitely recommend this product!

Fantastic service! The Petcube team got my camera working again so I’ll be able to see what my cat does all day tomorrow. Excellent, prompt and friendly service. I can’t recommend Petcube and the team highly enough, thank you 😊

Review.Titre: I really enjoyed using my Petcube
Review.Contenu: I really enjoyed using my Petcube. I did have to stop using it but only because I got a roommate and a camera was no longer wanted. Customer care was amazing, extremely quick and took care of my needs with zero hassle. I will happily return when I don’t have a roommate anymore.

I had a different pet camera before and it never seemed to work. I am pretty impressed so far with this one and the screen view and quality is awesome.I had a problem setting it up, but it was just me being a little incompetent and the support was great.

I totally wasted their time but Adrian B was so sweet and patient with me! One of my cameras was appearing offline but during the course of troubleshooting it came back on! I'm totally going to request Adrian B anytime I have an issue, that was one of the best customer service experiences ever!

So I have the first kickstarted model, and it has been a few years and it still works very well. The laser pointer is a little hard to manuver but it does it's work. The night vision is perfect. And seeing the recordings is very fun.I recently had an issue and customer support was amazing.I totally recommend it.

Review.Titre: Love our Petcube but kept saying it was "off-line"
Review.Contenu: We love our Petcube and all of a sudden it kept saying it was "off-line" so we weren't able to check on our puppy. ☹️ I contacted support and James was super nice and helped me get it back on-line by deleting it off the app and did the start up again and now it works perfect!! Thanks for your help!! Love being able to check on my baby boy when we're not home.

Review.Titre: Petcube awesome I have many devices to…
Review.Contenu: Petcube awesome I have many devices to keep eyes on my Critters crew love the notification and treat throwing everything about devices and services are awesome way better than any other ones out there well worth it

The chat service had very fast replies and the agents were very helpful. Also, what was added to the experience, was if the chat service disconnected they would email you to make sure if further help was needed.

I contacted support about 2 concerns i had with my petcube. At first i thought it was a tech issue because i knew i had paid, but they very quickly saw that my petcube on my app was in sleep mode. I really appreciated that they were able to figure out the problem so quickly! They were also able to help me figure out billing and managing of both my petcubes, and cleared up a lot of confusion for me. I really appreciated the quick answers, and everything was very clear and easy for me to understand. Thank you so much Alnie! :)

Review.Titre: I have been using Petcube for 8 months…
Review.Contenu: I have been using Petcube for 8 months now and I really enjoy going out and still be able to check on my fur baby’s. But I came to an issue with my cam and contacted the company asap and had some pointer on how to try and fix the issue but at the end my cam was not working anymore. So the company was nice enough with the proof of my purchase that they sent me a new cam so I can continue to enjoying watching my baby’s while being away. This is the best product I ever got and will be highly recommending my family and friends that.has pet to purchase one of these pet cam. Thank you so much to the company for all you have done to help with my issue.

My Petcube wouldn’t connect, it had a constant yellow light. I emailed support and got almost immediate assistance. After answering some questions, they troubleshooted my camera and it’s working very well. Great experience with the customer service.
The cube is really nice. The size fits anywhere, the picture is clear.My only problem is that is not very loud. While testing it out, I could barley hear my daughter calling the cat.

Review.Titre: Customer Service and response to email…
Review.Contenu: Customer Service and response to email and issues was very prompt and effective. I am very happy that my problem was so quickly resolved, enabling me to use my petcube camera and app again. Thank you petcube team!

Review.Titre: I love how I can check in on my pets…
Review.Contenu: I love how I can check in on my pets with these cameras. They were a little hard to set up originally but relatively easy to use. I wish they did not have the wires but they are so helpful.

Review.Titre: I was unable to view my camera on my…
Review.Contenu: I was unable to view my camera on my iPhone after an update and the staff at Petcube were very helpful in trouble shooting the problem. A few emails later and they were able to get me back online. Excellent customer service.

Review.Titre: Love my Petcube as I can watch my dogs when I’m out
Review.Contenu: Very happy with my Petcube camera which I bought from JB HiFi. I had a challenge with an echo when using the two way voice which the support team were very helpful in resolving (it was user error). Highly recommend this product.
Excellent customer support !I encountered a few little problems with my pet cubes and they guided me through it step by step and answered quickly to all of my questions, always with care and respect.

Review.Titre: Love our Petcube to check on our Fur…
Review.Contenu: Love our Petcube to check on our Fur baby when we're gone. We hadn't used it in a while so had unplugged it. When I went to use it again I couldn't get in online. I emailed customer support and they got back to me immediately and we emailed back and forth a few times until we figured out the issue. They were great to work with, I highly recommend!

Review.Titre: Petcube go the Extra Mile  The people at petcube have been…
Review.Contenu: The people at petcube have been outstanding in their efforts to ensure my issue was resolved. They were able to make an adjustment at their end to rectify the anomaly.

Review.Titre: Quick, easy fix, wonderful support assistance!
Review.Contenu: I have been neglecting to try to fix our Petcube because I assumed it would be a huge struggle, but with the help of the support Yulia, I had it up and running in less than ten minutes!
Love my Petcube. When I had a recent tech question the team were super responsive and helpful and followed up to ensure all was fine. Highly recommend!
Love our pet cube play, it's always nice to be able to check in on our fur kids when we are away and be able to give them some* activity as well.  Customer service was nice, prompt and helpful too!

Review.Titre: This is my third pet cube
Review.Contenu: This is my third pet cube. The company fully refunded my second that stopped working and I got two more. Always helpful if something doesn't work and will get you a resolution.

This is a really nice product. I have two different models and they work great. Customer service is 110% for even the oldest unit. (especially Alnie) I would buy another my cats LOVE it and my dogs are BUSTED! Now I know which one "did the crime" so I can ensure the right one does the time. (just kidding). Thanks folks, good stuff

Yenny was very knowledgeable and helpful. I know my fair share of tech, but was stumped when I couldn't get the camera working. Yenny helped me to get it back online and gave me a solution to prevent it from happening again in the future. Super helpful and quick service. I love petcube! Thanks guys!

Well what can I say, I needed help as my pet cam stopped working I did the usual things load/ unload app, turn off turn on camera and nothing. So I sent a HELP ME  e mail!! With in minutes my problem was fixed couldn't believe it. HAPPY DAYS, and I don't like technology, but I got through it.  Amen.....

Review.Titre: Very helpful when my petcube wasn't…
Review.Contenu: Very helpful when my petcube wasn't working as it should emailed me instructions on what to do so now working fine with the help off petcube Happy with the camera

Works great. My dogs are genuinely interested in it and I like that I can hang it on a wall. One feature request would be to have a sound effects button to play nosies for our dogs. You can talk and hear them but I would love to see a sound button or even play a recorded command with the owners voice.

The Petcube tech is great (I have 4 cameras to monitor my 2 dogs throughout my apartment), and the support are very helpful.  I was having problems receiving notifications via the app, the team were great in helping me troubleshoot and get everything working correctly

We were experiencing an issue with being able to speak and listen simultaneously. I sent a email, the staff immediately replied and within 3 or 4 emails the problem was resolved. Thank you for the great customer service and for being on it!!!

Review.Titre: The person who helped me did a…
Review.Contenu: The person who helped me did a fantastic job and was very understanding. They reacted quickly to my problem and came up with a resolution in minutes. Very proud to be apart of the Petcube family! P.S. Petcube if you’re reading this, give Mark a raise!

Review.Titre: I needed to cancel our monitoring…
Review.Contenu: I needed to cancel our monitoring account because we no longer had a petcube. Our acct was cancelled and we were credited for 5 months!!  Wow!!!  Great experience!!

Review.Titre: Yenny was so patient and knowledgable!
Review.Contenu: Yenny was so patient and knowledgable! She walked me through different troubleshoot methods until we found the solution! Love this company and my Petcube Bites <3
User friendly, easy set up and I would like to shout out to their support group which are fantastic and very helpful!
Excellent product. Had a wee issue with the app, emailed customer services and it was rectified in less than 30 minutes. Superb service.
I am extremely impressed by the prompt assistance received after I had an audio issue. It was resolved very quickly and professionally. Thank you.

Adrian was very helpful in providing me the resolution I was seeking without having me me jump through hoops. This speaks to the great customer-centric approach PetCube practices and it’s very much appreciated
Best balance price /quality! No experience with any bugs or mistakes. Life hack - you can even check your baby)
Pet cube is an incredible way to make sure your pets are safe and comfortable. I love talking to them when I’m at work and I love the notifications.
Such great customer service! I chatted with an online rep Jay about an issue I was having, and they were quick and efficient at addressing my concerns!
Petcube customer service were great. We had a faulty product, but they were quick to understand the situation and help us rectify it. Very easy to communicate with.

Review.Titre: Small problem - Big response - No more problem
Review.Contenu: I had a small issue I could not seem to fix. I sent a 'Contact us' email with my problem and I had a response within 15 minutes with easy to follow steps. No more problem. The best service response time..ever! Petcube Camera is a great little device. I look forward to watching my fur-baby from work.

Review.Titre: I originally had a lot of trouble…
Review.Contenu: I originally had a lot of trouble setting up my Pet Cube.However with several emails, the team at PetCube have been able to resolve my issues.

Review.Titre: Easy To Use and Effective Product, Plus Incredible Customer Service
Review.Contenu: I have 3 Petcubes. They are incredibly easy to sync up to a phone and install in a matter of minutes. They work amazingly well. I love being able to check in on my fur babies wherever I am. Their customer care is ABOVE AND BEYOND! I highly recommend.
I had an issue with the sound and the quickness of the answer and the resolution of the issue was unbelievable.

Having not used my Petcube for a couple of years, I was struggling to get it working again, so emailed Petcube Customer Care and they responded quickly, giving me detailed instructions on what to do, and as a result it's now working fine.  I highly recommend their super-prompt customer service - special shout out to Adrian for helping me.

Review.Titre: Mark helped with my queries and issue…
Review.Contenu: Mark helped with my queries and issue efficiently. Was very quick to process as well, thank you for the efficient service
For Petcube bites 2The product works very good and the subscription can be canceled anytime. The support is really helpful and very uncomplicated.

Review.Titre: Forgot password never got email with directions
Review.Contenu: Representative helped me log back into my account after forgetting password ! They kindly sent me a link and in minutes I was back into my account !!
This company has the best customer service that I have experienced in years. Prompt, helpful, experienced and great follow through. I wish all companies used their process!
Pet cube has made me feel at ease when I have to be away from home. I able to keep an eye on my kitties. It was extremely helpful when my one kittys was ill. I highly recommend.
I know Petcube from spendwithukraine. The cam works very well even in the dark. Treats box fit different size treats. I will definitely recommend to others.

At first, no answer to my issue. They emailed back next day. Not only canceled subscription, but reimbursed me right away! I don't have a need for the petcube right now. Still have it & will probably use in the future!
